json.text: The global life expectancy is 71.4 years
but in the US it's a bit higher at 78.6

alive on Earth.

You produce 0.4 millilitres of saliva per minute
and 0.5 - 1 liter per day.
That means in a life time you can fill anywhere between
180 to 360 bath tubs full of spit
Men cry an average of 1 time per month and women 2.7 times, giving you an average of 1,745 good cries per lifetime.
The average adult is not getting their 10,000 steps in
as the average US adult only takes around 5,100 steps per day.

Men are continually making new sperm

The baby boomers have had an average of 11 sexual partners
but millennials are only expected to have

From the ages 20 to 60, it's estimated to learn 1 to 2 new words per day
with an average total of 42 thousand words.
This number declines as we age and is likely related to our brain decaying at a rate of 5% per decade after the age of 40.
The average person 15 years or older in the US works 7.9 hours per day
and with the average age of retirement

at the office.
But are you really working or just looking at memes?

496.4 minutes and women sleep for 507.6 minutes

But even when you're awake we spend 10% of our day with our eyes closed
as the average person blink 28,800 times
per day or 15 to 20 blinks per minute.
